title: Jesus, You're No Judas Maccabeus. Palm Sunday as Black Swan Event
description: Palm Sunday is where Jesus is received as King by some in Jerusalem. He cleanses the temple and shows his kingship over the natural world as well. What was on the minds of those in Jerusalem? Would he lead a revolt like Judas Maccabeus?
